fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: ‎- At night, visit a player. If they are a target as authorized by your contract, you will attack them. Otherwise, you will not do anything except visit astrally.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
‎- May only spawn in a contract game.
‎- Alignment predetermined by host.
‎- If you fulfill your contract, then the game ends with your faction's victory.
‎- At the start of the game, you recieve 3 names, one of them being a member of a target evil faction.
